metadata.description:
do you ever just laugh in traumatic situations because you don’t know what else to do? or just make a joke out of it ? because same. after my first drop, ‘sad girls always finish first,’ i realized that i was coming into terms with who i am as a manic and impulsive person who is always too nice & has severe trust issues. lol. but instead of making a sad song that would make me self reflect on my life (because i have plenty of those to go around) i decided to turn it into a dance vibe. and so, fantasies was born.
this song is about a world where my toxic love traits come into play because even though i pick up the wrong habits for relationships and all things love, there’s still a side of me that wants to be better, aka tell me ur fantasies and i got u. so have fun, dance, question life, or potentially heal something that this song reminds u of. i hope u love it & thank u for supporting me as always. :) ily

lyrics.text:
loving me
must be hard to bare
i’m such a problem u cant take me anywhere
got a lot of darkness
up inside my head
its not fair

forget ab pain
look at my waist
look at my body
dont wanna give up
i wanna give in
i wanna get lost (faster)
i wanna get high
i wanna get low
i wanna say sorry boy i wanna say sorry ohhhh

fantasies from your daydreams
all the things u want 
satin sheets line my silk screen
(u can) come n take it off
hard to breathe make my knees weak
i can read your thoughts 
your thoughts x3 

cant replace
how i made u feel
whats in ur mind maybe i can make it real 
if i say 
i can help it heal
how’d that feel

forget ab pain
look at my waist
look at my body
dont wanna give up
i wanna give in
i wanna get lost
i wanna get high

i wanna say sorry

your thoughts x3
